name: spo-add-formextension-to-list
title: Associate Form Customizer Extension with List or Libraries Form
shortDescription: This script allows you to associate Form Customizer Extension to List/Library via Content Type properties
longDescription: This script allows you to associate Form Customizer Extension to List/Library via Content Type properties. With SPFx version 1.15.1, we can now create new type of Extension as Form customizer which allows us to associate custom forms to SharePoint List.

thumbnails.alt: Preview of the sample Associate Form Customizer Extension with List or Libraries Form
